Header.title: Transform Plastic Waste Into a Sustainable Future
Header.paragraph: Leading the revolution in plastic recycling with innovative technology and commitment to a cleaner planet.

About.paragraph: Umiya Plastics is dedicated to transforming plastic waste into valuable resources through cutting-edge recycling technologies. Our mission is to reduce environmental impact, promote sustainability, and create a cleaner future for generations to come. We specialize in collecting, sorting, and processing various types of plastics, turning them into high-quality recycled materials for diverse applications.

Features.title: 1. Collection
Features.text: Plastic waste is collected from households, businesses, and recycling centers across the region.

Features.title: 2. Sorting
Features.text: Advanced technology separates different types of plastics by resin type and color for optimal processing.

Features.title: 3. Cleaning
Features.text: Thorough washing removes contaminants, labels, and adhesives to ensure pure material quality.

Features.title: 4. Processing
Features.text: Cleaned plastics are melted, pelletized, and transformed into raw materials ready for manufacturing.
